result.sf:Markup: <apex:page showHeader="true" sidebar="true" standardController="FLODocs__FLO_Process__c" extensions="FLODocs.FloProcessEditNewController"> <apex:sectionHeader title="FLO Process" subtitle="New/Edit FLO Process"/> <apex:form > <apex:pageMessages /> <apex:pageBlock title="Process Info"> <apex:pageBlockButtons > <apex:commandButton action="{!save}" value="Save" reRender="" /> <apex:commandButton action="{!cancel}" value="Cancel" /> </apex:pageBlockButtons> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Main" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField required="true" value="{!floProcess.Name}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Number__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Parent_num__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Parent__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Step_Type__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Status__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Update_Child_Statuses__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Update_Child_Owners_and_Approvers__c}" /> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Additional Approver(s)" isUser="true" leftOption="{!listAAOptions}" rightLabel="Selected Additional Approver(s)" rightOption="{!selectedAA}" size="7" width="231px"/> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Process Docs" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Overview__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Test_Date__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Process_Description__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Comment_Ideas__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__To_Archive__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Archive_Status__c}" /> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Steps" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Next_Process__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Yes_Step__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__No_Step__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Other_Step__c}" /> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Supporting Process(es)" leftOption="{!listProcesses}" rightLabel="Selected Process(es)" rightOption="{!selectedProcesses}" size="7" width="150px"/> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Customizations" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Visualforce Page(s)/Component(s)" isProcess="true" sfdcType="ApexPage,ApexComponent" leftOption="{!listPages}" rightLabel="Selected Visualforce Page(s)/Component(s)" rightOption="{!selectedPages}" size="7" width="150px"/> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Apex Class(es)/Trigger(s)" isProcess="true" sfdcType="ApexTrigger,ApexClass" leftOption="{!listScripts}" rightLabel="Selected Apex Class(es)/Trigger(s)" rightOption="{!selectedScripts}" size="7" width="150px"/> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Workflow(s)/Flow(s)/Approval Process(es)" isProcess="true" sfdcType="Workflow,Flow,ApprovalProcess" leftOption="{!listWorkflows}" rightLabel="Selected Workflow(s)/Flow(s)/Approval Process(es)" rightOption="{!selectedWorkflows}" size="7" width="150px"/> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Field(s)" leftOption="{!listFields}" isProcess="true" sfdcType="CustomField" rightLabel="Selected Field(s)" rightOption="{!selectedFields}" size="7" width="150px"/> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Report(s)" leftOption="{!listReports}" isProcess="true" sfdcType="Report" rightLabel="Selected Report(s)" rightOption="{!selectedReports}" size="7" width="150px"/> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Other Customization(s)" isProcess="true" sfdcType="Other" leftOption="{!listOtherCusts}" rightLabel="Selected Customization(s)" rightOption="{!selectedOtherCusts}" size="7" width="150px"/> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Continuous Improvement" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Audit_Approval_Policy__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Update_Child_Process_Policies__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Next_Process_Review_Date__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Copy_Of__c}" /> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Process Audience(s)" leftOption="{!listProcAudiences}" rightLabel="Selected Process Audience(s)" rightOption="{!selectedProcAudiences}" size="7" width="150px"/> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Process Editor(s)" leftOption="{!listProcEditors}" rightLabel="Selected Process Editor(s)" rightOption="{!selectedProcEditors}" size="7" width="150px"/> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Copy_Children__c}" /> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Implementation" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Assigned_Implementer__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Target_Implementation_Date__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Estimated_Implementation_Effort__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Material_Risk_Assessed__c}" /> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Automation" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Assigned_Employee__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Assign_from_Record__c}" /> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Test" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField value="{!floProcess.FLODocs__Test_Template__c}" /> </apex:pageBlockSection> </apex:pageBlock> </apex:form> </apex:page>

result.sf:Name: FloFinder

result.sf:Markup:
Useful link about how to create ConnectedApp: here

Steps to follow:

  • Create a connected app in Setup > Create > Apps
  • Extract its consumer key and secret key from the ConnectedApp created
  • Add username/pass/token of the Admin as well as the ConnectedApp information mentioned above in Flo Connection Service record
result.sf:Name: FLoRemoteSitePage

result.sf:Markup: <apex:page showHeader="true" sidebar="true" standardController="FLODocs__FLO_Process_Issue__c" extensions="FLODocs.FloProcessIssueEditNewController"> <apex:sectionHeader title="FLO Process Issue" subtitle="New/Edit FLO Process Issue"/> <apex:form > <apex:pageMessages /> <apex:pageBlock title="Process Issue Info"> <apex:pageBlockButtons > <apex:commandButton action="{!save}" value="Save" reRender="" /> <apex:commandButton action="{!cancel}" value="Cancel" /> </apex:pageBlockButtons> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Information" collapsible="false" columns="2"> <apex:inputField required="true" value="{!processIssue.Name}" /> <apex:inputField required="true" value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Type__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Issue_Description__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Process__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Status__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Approver__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__External_Ticket_Link__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__External_Ticket_Number__c}" /> <c:FloMultiSelectList leftLabel="Select Flo Customization" isCustomization="true" leftOption="{!listCustomizationsOptions}" rightLabel="Selected Customization(s)" rightOption="{!selectedCustomization}" size="7" width="196px"/> </apex:pageBlockSection> <apex:pageBlockSection title="Implementation" collapsible="false" columns="2" id="scopePb"> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Target_Resolution_Date__c}" /> <apex:inputField value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Assigned__c}" /> <apex:inputfield value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Request_Process_Help__c}"/> <apex:inputfield value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Related_Test__c}"/> <apex:inputfield value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Effort_Required__c }"/> <apex:inputfield value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Originating_URL__c}"/> <apex:inputfield value="{!processIssue.FLODocs__Test__c}"/> </apex:pageBlockSection> </apex:pageBlock> </apex:form> </apex:page>
